oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Federal breast plate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brass US eagle breast plate. Stamped on back "W. Smith, Brooklyn". Revovered from Murfreesboro, Rutherford County, Tenn. The breast plate adorned the cartridge box sling and was issued to Federal infantry soliders. W. Smith manufactured US waist belt, cartridge box and breast plates under contract with the US Army from 1861 until at least 1864. This stamp appears on many US plates from the Civil War era.
